description: A collection of circles in a curved trapezoidal formation with the wider end at the top; there is also a thinner trapezoidal formation below the larger one with the wider end at the bottom. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a black triangle toward the bottom of the larger trapezoidal formation and a pale orange triangle toward the top of the smaller one.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
